column5: He settles his problems with abuse. He hurt you intentionally. This is not ok! Get out of this relationship. Let it serve as a lesson for him.

Better her than you. What makes you think he wouldn‚Äôt cheat on her too? Cheaters usually don‚Äôt change. Fuck that guy, you dodged a bullet.

Edit: I forgot to mention the exact same thing happened to me. Only difference is that their relationship wasn‚Äôt perfect and they broke up after two years. I found a new boyfriend whom I feel an even greater connection to. Just wanted you to keep trying and never think you‚Äôre not good enough.
Does she have an Instagram? I‚Äôd love to follow this cat for more pictures, this is too freaking cute.

Do you have pets? A reason to live? You shouldn‚Äôt be so hard on yourself, your brain is literally different than a normal brain. 8 out of 1000 of us get this illness. Try to find something you like. I read books because it‚Äôs all I can really do for a hobby. If you want recommendations you can hit me up. Yeah, I know, exactly! I never feel like painting...when I force myself I just make poor quality pieces. That‚Äôs why your art shocks me, do you take antipsychotics? My pills stop me from feeling like I want to create art. I‚Äôm like, how did you make this?! It‚Äôs so freaking good!

Your medicine is making you ‚Äúlazy.‚Äù I feel that way too. I had so much potential and it was squandered. You‚Äôre not useless or anything. Do the best you can, that‚Äôs all anyone can ask. You‚Äôre not lesser than anyone, your hardships are enough work. I wish the world could understand us. Try not to feel bad, you have enough to deal with.
Some people just aren‚Äôt meant to be with anyone. I don‚Äôt know who would put up with her. Yikes.
Don‚Äôt fall for her shit. Most people lose their virginity in their 20s. But don‚Äôt feel pressured to do anything. I think this stigma over virginity is ridiculous.
She‚Äôs being extremely possessive and hypocritical. Just carry on and ignore her. She‚Äôll likely embarrass herself but she doesn‚Äôt own you.
Such a cute name. Adorable :)

There‚Äôs really nothing I need to tell you. Sounds like you know how to handle the situation. Fuck that guy though! Nobody deserves to be treated like that, don‚Äôt even look back. He‚Äôs going to regret everything.
I don‚Äôt feel sorry for you. How does it feel? It hurts, doesn‚Äôt it? That‚Äôs exactly what you put her through. It‚Äôs petty, sure. But this relationship is over, I think.

I was the loner artist in high school. Really weird. I barely spoke up but a lot of people took interest in me. I was just too shy to make friends.

Yeah. Exact same thing happened to me. My ex claimed he was moving to be with his family and to get help for his alcoholism. Well, he had been cheating on me for a year as it turned out and was moving to a new city with his affair partner. Which I wasn‚Äôt sad, I was angry. Lol funny though, I wasn‚Äôt jealous bc she looked like a muppet. I ended up upgrading to a new guy who is exactly my type. He‚Äôs perfect and I‚Äôm glad I‚Äôve moved on. I wish the best for you and there‚Äôs nothing wrong with you. The shitty person was your ex....you were with the wrong guy. He showed his true colors and he‚Äôs scum. Try to move on and be happy.
It actually looks like a doll
You must be fun at parties. Chill the fuck out. Most normal people can figure out what I‚Äôm trying to convey. I‚Äôm not going to bother with this.
It‚Äôs fine if you don‚Äôt believe in the paranormal. I‚Äôm just saying you can‚Äôt prove that it‚Äôs not spiritual. How the fuck should I know what it is? But I still have proof of something.

There‚Äôs plenty of proof. And just because you don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs substantial is ridiculous. I‚Äôve recorded my voices on EVPs and got confirmations from several different people they heard what I heard. Perhaps they‚Äôre not spirits...possibly parasites, djinn, thought forms, aliens?
I can‚Äôt. My illness effects me too greatly every day for it to be ignored. When I act weird or uncomfortable I have to explain to people why. I never tell acquaintances though.
I think it‚Äôs spiritual. You can‚Äôt prove it‚Äôs not. I‚Äôll just leave that there.

Well I was emaciated and didn‚Äôt feel like I looked it. 49kg is the ideal weight! You‚Äôre fucking perfect and don‚Äôt let the photo gallery play head games with you. I absolutely hate shallow assholes who think a girls value comes from her looks. Your friend did nothing wrong, but I understand the frustration. Seriously theres no reason for you to hate yourself, everyone is different. The truly ugly people are the ones rotting from the inside. Don‚Äôt fall for their shit. You are absolutely just as valid as your friend and beautiful in your own way.

Schizophrenia is a thought disorder along with other things. I can‚Äôt even look at children or men without intrusive thoughts sometimes. I‚Äôm constantly self-conscious of being judged for doing the wrong thing and end up thinking something bad inevitably. it sucks and I know it‚Äôs not my fault. But yeah, pretty daily occurrence for me. I miss the good old days when this wasn‚Äôt a thing.
If your meds aren‚Äôt  getting rid of the voices within a week to two weeks at most it‚Äôs time to try a new medication.

Fuck. I relate so much to this post. I am so fucking irate over the current situation. A day ago I went through partial blindness because of my antipsychotics and the voices were extremely mad and just insulting my appearance and other shallow shit. Like who the fuck deserves that tormenting? I drink a lot too. And I take a lot of prescription drugs. What choice do some of us have?! I would be dead if I didn‚Äôt have my cat. I try to give him the best life imaginable with daily wet food and new cat trees. I spoil him. He needs me therefore I‚Äôm alive and it sounds so pathetic. But I totally get this post. My heart breaks for you.

I‚Äôve stopped writing everything down. The voices are never genuine. They pretend to be nice and then turn bad on me. It‚Äôs all so predictable and boring. I stopped giving a shit after realizing there was
a pattern.
Don‚Äôt feel bad. You‚Äôre super young! I would hate for a young kid like you to be stressed about blackmail or any repercussions. You definitely did the right thing.

Worst case scenario: it‚Äôs a dude. It‚Äôs not normal, I‚Äôll tell you that. Be careful in the future, especially when giving out nudes. I would only do this with someone you trust and know...but the best thing to do is to not send nudes at all. It could backfire.
I‚Äôm just gonna say his stuff is very easy to read and pretty interesting material I haven‚Äôt read anywhere else. He‚Äôs a great researcher.

I had no idea there was alien/ufo info in this book, but it was one of the most refreshing alien books I‚Äôve read up to date. It was published in 2011. Redfern is a great author btw.

Oh boy. My brother ate all the new groceries in the first couple days. I have always felt anxiety about eating the food immediately before it was gone. The solution: buy your own mini-fridge and buy a lock for it. It helped me sooo much. Finally my bro moved out and my fridge broke but things are way less stressful now. NTA
